column2: Begin an Investiture Conflict
The time has come for the church to reclaim its right to control all church properties. The secular lords will resist however I am sure we can convince them.

Through out the land. Our people are being oppressed. The time to organize ourselves into armys under our religion. We must liberate our people!

Found the Sultanate of Rum

The heretical caliph's power cannot be tolerated. However we cannot risk a byzantine counter attack during our invasion. If we create a new Sultan in armenia we can buy time to execute the invasion...
Invade Anatolia
We must by our brothers in persia time to deal with the heretical caliph. We must strike against the byzantines!
Restore the Khanate!
We have regained our footholds and nearly reconquered all of our lost territory. You have earned yourself the right to call yourself the High Khan
Reform the Administration
We have proven ourself to be the successor to the great Khazars. We must reform our administration and seat you on the throne!
Proclaim Yourself Caliph
The old Caliph has become decedent and lost his sense of justice! He has become an arbitrary mess. He must be replaced. By force if necessary...
